sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom';
import {
  Container,
  Paper,
  Typography,
  Box,
  Button,
  Alert,
  Card,
  CardContent,
  List,
  ListItem,
  ListItemIcon,
  ListItemText,
  Divider,
  Checkbox
} from '@mui/material';
import {
  Warning as WarningIcon,
  Info as InfoIcon,
  CheckCircle as CheckIcon,
  Error as ErrorIcon,
  Timer as TimerIcon
} from '@mui/icons-material';

const Instructions = () => {
  const navigate = useNavigate();
  const [acknowledged, setAcknowledged] = useState(false);

  const handleContinue = () => {
    if (!acknowledged) {
      return;
    }
    navigate('/interview');
  };

  return (
    <Container component="main" maxWidth="md" sx={{ mt: 4 }}>
      <Paper elevation={3} sx={{ p: 4 }}>
        <Typography component="h1" variant="h4" align="center" gutterBottom>
          Interview Instructions
        </Typography>
        <Typography variant="subtitle1" align="center" color="text.secondary" sx={{ mb: 3 }}>
          Please read carefully before starting your interview
        </Typography>

        <Alert severity="warning" sx={{ mb: 3 }}>
          <Typography variant="subtitle2" sx={{ fontWeight: 'bold', mb: 1 }}>
            ⚠️ IMPORTANT WARNING
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="body2">
            Violation of any instruction may result in immediate termination of your interview session
            without prior notice. Please ensure you understand and agree to all terms before proceeding.
          </Typography>
        </Alert>

        <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', gap: 3, mb: 3 }}>
          {/* Technical Requirements */}
          <Card>
            <CardContent>
              <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: 1, mb: 2 }}>
                <InfoIcon color="primary" />
                <Typography variant="h6">Technical Requirements</Typography>
              </Box>
              <List dense>
                <ListItem>
                  <ListItemIcon>
                    <CheckIcon color="success" />
                  </ListItemIcon>
                  <ListItemText
                    primary="Stable internet connection is required"
                    secondary="Minimum 5 Mbps upload/download speed recommended"
                  />
                </ListItem>
                <ListItem>
                  <ListItemIcon>
                    <CheckIcon color="success" />
                  </ListItemIcon>
                  <ListItemText
                    primary="Use a quiet environment"
                    secondary="Minimize background noise and distractions"
                  />
                </ListItem>
                <ListItem>
                  <ListItemIcon>
                    <CheckIcon color="success" />
                  </ListItemIcon>
                  <ListItemText
                    primary="Ensure proper lighting"
                    secondary="Your face should be clearly visible to the camera"
                  />
                </ListItem>
                <ListItem>
                  <ListItemIcon>
                    <CheckIcon color="success" />
                  </ListItemIcon>
                  <ListItemText
                    primary="Keep camera stable"
                    secondary="Avoid moving the camera during the interview"
                  />
                </ListItem>
              </List>
            </CardContent>
          </Card>

          {/* Prohibited Actions */}
          <Card>
            <CardContent>
              <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: 1, mb: 2 }}>
                <ErrorIcon color="error" />
                <Typography variant="h6">Prohibited Actions</Typography>
              </Box>
              <List dense>
                <ListItem>
                  <ListItemIcon>
                    <ErrorIcon color="error" />
                  </ListItemIcon>
                  <ListItemText
                    primary="Do not look away from the camera for extended periods"
                    secondary="Maintain eye contact with the interviewer"
                  />
                </ListItem>
                <ListItem>
                  <ListItemIcon>
                    <ErrorIcon color="error" />
                  </ListItemIcon>
                  <ListItemText
                    primary="Do not use external assistance"
                    secondary="No second monitors, notes, or help from others"
                  />
                </ListItem>
                <ListItem>
                  <ListItemIcon>
                    <ErrorIcon color="error" />
                  </ListItemIcon>
                  <ListItemText
                    primary="Do not leave the frame"
                    secondary="Stay within camera view throughout the interview"
                  />
                </ListItem>
                <ListItem>
                  <ListItemIcon>
                    <ErrorIcon color="error" />
                  </ListItemIcon>
                  <ListItemText
                    primary="Do not use headphones or earbuds"
                    secondary="Audio must be clearly audible through your microphone"
                  />
                </ListItem>
                <ListItem>
                  <ListItemIcon>
                    <ErrorIcon color="error" />
                  </ListItemIcon>
                  <ListItemText
                    primary="Do not interrupt the interviewer"
                    secondary="Wait for your turn to speak"
                  />
                </ListItem>
              </List>
            </CardContent>
          </Card>

          {/* Interview Process */}
          <Card>
            <CardContent>
              <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: 1, mb: 2 }}>
                <TimerIcon color="primary" />
                <Typography variant="h6">Interview Process</Typography>
              </Box>
              <List dense>
                <ListItem>
                  <ListItemIcon>
                    <InfoIcon color="info" />
                  </ListItemIcon>
                  <ListItemText
                    primary="Questions will be presented one at a time"
                    secondary="Answer each question clearly and completely"
                  />
                </ListItem>
                <ListItem>
                  <ListItemIcon>
                    <InfoIcon color="info" />
                  </ListItemIcon>
                  <ListItemText
                    primary="You may be asked follow-up questions"
                    secondary="Be prepared to elaborate on your answers"
                  />
                </ListItem>
                <ListItem>
                  <ListItemIcon>
                    <InfoIcon color="info" />
                  </ListItemIcon>
                  <ListItemText
                    primary="Screen sharing may be requested for coding questions"
                    secondary="Share only relevant windows/tabs"
                  />
                </ListItem>
                <ListItem>
                  <ListItemIcon>
                    <InfoIcon color="info" />
                  </ListItemIcon>
                  <ListItemText
                    primary="Interview duration varies by position"
                    secondary="Typically 30-60 minutes depending on role complexity"
                  />
                </ListItem>
              </List>
            </CardContent>
          </Card>

          {/* Privacy Notice */}
          <Card>
            <CardContent>
              <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: 1, mb: 2 }}>
                <WarningIcon color="warning" />
                <Typography variant="h6">Privacy & Data Collection</Typography>
              </Box>
              <Typography variant="body2" sx={{ mb: 2 }}>
                By proceeding with this interview, you consent to:
              </Typography>
              <List dense>
                <ListItem>
                  <ListItemText
                    primary="• Audio and video recording for evaluation purposes"
                    secondary="Recordings are used solely for interview assessment"
                  />
                </ListItem>
                <ListItem>
                  <ListItemText
                    primary="• Facial analysis for posture and engagement tracking"
                    secondary="AI-powered analysis to provide feedback on presentation"
                  />
                </ListItem>
                <ListItem>
                  <ListItemText
                    primary="• Speech analysis for communication assessment"
                    secondary="Analysis of filler words, clarity, and confidence"
                  />
                </ListItem>
                <ListItem>
                  <ListItemText
                    primary="• Data processing for personalized feedback"
                    secondary="Your responses are analyzed to provide detailed feedback"
                  />
                </ListItem>
              </List>
            </CardContent>
          </Card>
        </Box>

        <Divider sx={{ my: 3 }} />

        {/* Acknowledgment */}
        <Box sx={{ mb: 3 }}>
          <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: 1, mb: 2 }}>
            <Checkbox
              checked={acknowledged}
              onChange={(e) => setAcknowledged(e.target.checked)}
              color="primary"
            />
            <Typography variant="body1">
              I have read, understood, and agree to comply with all the instructions and terms above.
            </Typography>
          </Box>
          <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
            By checking this box, you acknowledge that violation of any instruction may result in
            immediate termination of your interview session.
          </Typography>
        </Box>

        <Button
          variant="contained"
          onClick={handleContinue}
          disabled={!acknowledged}
          fullWidth
          size="large"
          sx={{ mt: 2 }}
        >
          Start Interview
        </Button>
      </Paper>
    </Container>
  );
};

export default Instructions;
